meaningMnemonic: You get <radical>rain</radical> <radical>orders</radical>. Your orders are to make sure there is <kanji>zero</kanji> <kanji>spill</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: The best way to make sure there is <kanji>zero</kanji> <kanji>spill</kanji> when it rains is to get rid of the rain. You use a special <reading>ray</reading> (れい) gun and zap the rain right out of the sky. There will be zero spills because there will be zero rain.
